text: يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ أَعْرِضْ عَنْ هَـٰذَآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ قَدْ جَآءَ أَمْرُ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَإِنَّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِمْ عَذَابٌ غَيْرُ مَرْدُودٍ

translation.en.sahih: [The angels said], "O Abraham, give up this [plea]. Indeed, the command of your Lord has come, and indeed, there will reach them a punishment that cannot be repelled."
translation.id.indonesian: Hai Ibrahim, tinggalkanlah soal jawab ini, sesungguhnya telah datang ketetapan Tuhanmu, dan sesungguhnya mereka itu akan didatangi azab yang tidak dapat ditolak.
